definition: last week
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
see 上聲|上声[shang3 sheng1]
individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general
star/heavenly body/satellite/small amount
a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]

sentences.english: The old bridge was last week .
sentences.chinese: 那座舊橋上個星期被拆除了。

sentences.english: He once again nosed ahead of me on the horse race last week.
sentences.chinese: 上個星期的馬賽上，他又一次以微弱優勢勝過了我。

sentences.english: We don't know (A. that; B . where) Mr. Tim worked last Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 我們不知道上個星期天提姆在哪工作。

sentences.english: Last week, Quick kept his promise.
sentences.chinese: 上個星期，魁克實現了他的承諾。

sentences.english: I was having English class at this time last week.
sentences.chinese: 上個星期的這個時間我都在上英語課。

sentences.english: Last Saturday, there was a scary movie on TV.
sentences.chinese: 上個星期六，電視上演了一部恐怖電影。

sentences.english: A woman grieves near her relative's body after dozens of people were killed in landslides in China's Gansu province last week.
sentences.chinese: 上個星期，中國甘肅爆發泥石流，造成許多人死亡。

sentences.english: Art, I gave these out last Weds.
sentences.chinese: 我發出這些是在上個星期三。

sentences.english: I was doing my homework at 9 o'clock p. m. last Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 上個星期天晚上九點我正在做家庭作業。

sentences.english: Our family celebrated my grandparents' golden wedding anniversary in a big way last Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 上個星期日，我家隆重慶祝了我祖父母的金婚紀念日。

sentences.english: She is peacocking the skirt which she bought last Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 她正在炫耀她上個星期天買的那條裙子。

sentences.english: Last Sunday, I went to the Book City to buy some books by bus.
sentences.chinese: 上個星期，我坐公車去書城去買幾本書。

sentences.english: President Barack Obama called last week for Megrahi to be put under house arrest.
sentences.chinese: 奧巴馬總統上個星期呼籲把邁格拉希軟禁在家。

sentences.english: Last week, I was looking in her mouth and decided to stick my tongue in it.
sentences.chinese: 而上個星期，我看着她的嘴，於是決定伸舌頭進去。

sentences.english: Last week I visited the earthquake zone in Pakistan.
sentences.chinese: 上個星期我訪問了巴基斯坦的地震區。

sentences.english: Last week North Korea submitted a long-awaited document that listed its nuclear holdings.
sentences.chinese: 北韓上個星期提交了等待已久的北韓核項目清單。

definition: to have lingering fears/trepidation remaining after a trauma (idiom)
to drive a cart
to move one's base (of operations)/to reposition/to relocate
to be all present
excuse me (i.e. let me through, please)
to face the wall and ponder about one's misdeeds/to stand in the corner (punishment)/(fig.) to examine one's conscience
English corner/spoken English practice group
cheerful and optimistic/in a good mood/gaily
to rant and rave/to be scared, upset (Beijing dialect)
Heaven knows!
to try one's luck/to leave sth to chance
to have one's spirits dampened/to feel disappointed
clumsy/all thumbs
see 串門|串门[chuan4 men2]
to leap and frisk about (idiom); lively/healthy and active
way/method/means/Taiwan pr. [fa1 r5]
